name: Chrstyl - Satin Chrome - Prizm Black Lens Sunglasses

features: DESIGN: A lifestyle sunglass with a distinct aesthetic that uses a single design feature to join the frame and temples
CONSTRUCTION: The multi-faced rimless construction with “rollbar” aesthetic is designed to help maintain retention and rigidity
FRAME MATERIAL: Lightweight O Matter™ frame material combined with stress-resistant stainless steel is designed to provide durability and all-day comfort
PRIZM™ LENS TECHNOLOGY: Available with Prizm™ lenses that are designed to enhance color, contrast and detail to make the most of any activity
FIT: Three-point fit is designed for comfort and to hold your eyewear in precise optical alignment, with added adjustable silicone nosepads for the ultimate fit
